pt.iul.ista.poo.gui

Interface ImageTile

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Floor, Hero

    public interface ImageTile
    Author:
    POO2016 ImageTile is the interface required to all "images" used by ImageMatrixGUI. ImageTile is only required to provide the name of the image (e.g. "XxxX") and its position (in tile coordinates, with 0,0 in the top left corner and increasing to the right in the horizontal axis and downwards in the vertical axis). The ImageMatrixGUI will look for an image with that name in the "images" folder (e.g. "XxxX.png") and draw that image in the window.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      The name of the image.
      Position getPosition()
      Getter for the position (in grid coordinates) were the image should be placed.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The name of the image. Must correspond to the name of an image file in the "images" folder otherwise i will trigger one of the following exceptions: FileNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException
        Returns:
        The name of the image file containing the desired image (without extention)

      • getPosition

        Position getPosition()
        Getter for the position (in grid coordinates) were the image should be placed.
        Returns:
        A position.
